## isEnabled() function

Checks if a log event level includes the target log event level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isEnabled(level: LogEventLevel, target: LogEventLevel): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | <code>LogEventLevel</code> | The level to check. |
|  target | <code>LogEventLevel</code> | The target level. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

True if the checked level contains the target level, or if the checked level is undefined.
